<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>A delayed scheduled job is triggered after upgrade to migrate the property encrypted values</description>
        <name>Migrate Property Encrypter Value</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (GlideProperties.getBoolean('glide.properties.encrypter.use_kmf', false))
    queueJobTrigger();

function queueJobTrigger() {
    var JOB_NAME = "Property Encrypter Migration Job";
    var JOB_ID = "63f6d7234f5121103bcb2894c8c7149c";
    var JOB_EXECUTION_TIME = new String(getExecutionTime());
    var READY_STATE = 0;
    var RUN_ONCE = 0;
    var trigger = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger");
    trigger.setValue("state", READY_STATE);
    trigger.setValue("job_id", JOB_ID);
    trigger.setValue("name", JOB_NAME);
    trigger.setValue("next_action", JOB_EXECUTION_TIME);
    trigger.setValue("trigger_type", RUN_ONCE);
    trigger.insert();
}

/*
 * Function calculates time twenty four hours from now.
 */
function getExecutionTime() {
    var offset = 0;
    var DELAY = 24 * 3600 * 1000;
    var now = new GlideDateTime();
    var tzOffset = now.getTZOffset();
    if (now.isDST())
        offset = now.getDSTOffset();
    now.add(DELAY + offset + (-1) * tzOffset);
    return now.getDisplayValue();
}]]></script>
